attributes.action: Vote of no confidence & resignation of David Mundell Secretary of State Scotland
attributes.background:
Grounds for this petition are that David Mundell 
Secretary of State for Scotland
Has never and will continue to withhold/block Scotland's best interests to aid the current Tory government in their interests.
Against Scotland and the country's people

rejection.details:
The resignation of an individual Minister is not a matter for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

We could accept a petition simply calling for a vote of no confidence in a Minister, because that is something that the House of Commons could do.
